short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces an embedded video with a link to the video page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an WebExtension addon based on my LinkTube userscript.

Supported sites:
YouTube, Dailymotion, Vimeo, Metacafe, FunnyOrDie.

For more information read:
http://sebaro.pro/linktube
https://github.com/sebaro/linktube
